title: Nomsmas 2018
thumbnail_alt: Piles of white sugar cookies with red and green sprinkles.

media.caption: Piles of white sugar cookies with red and green sprinkles.
Stacks of peanut butter kiss cookies.
Red velvet cookies cooling on a rack.
Chocolate-dipped peanut butter balls with red and green nonpareils.
Chocolate chip cookies cooling on a rack.

overview:
1,959 Christmas treats, in 11 different forms:

  • Chocolate-dipped peanut butter balls
  • Red velvet cookies
  • Chocolate chip cookies
  • Chocolate-dipped chocolate chip shortbreads
  • Snickerdoodles
  • Sugar cutouts
  • Death by chocolate cookies
  • Cocoa cookies
  • Ginger cookies
  • Peanut butter kiss cookies
  • Oatmeal M&M cookies

Oh, and 11 pounds of fudge and peppermint bark.

A typical holiday weekend's worth of baking.
